findings.rationale: An indefinite duration may lead to perpetual obligations that are difficult to manage and can expose the parties to ongoing liability.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect indefinitely and shall survive termination of any business relationship between the parties.

findings.rationale: The vague and broad definition may lead to disputes over what constitutes confidential information, potentially exposing the Receiving Party to unintentional breaches.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all non-public, proprietary or confidential information disclosed by the Disclosing Party to the Receiving Party.

findings.rationale: The requirement to return all confidential information could be burdensome, especially if the Receiving Party has integrated such information into their operations.
findings.evidence_quote: Upon termination, the Receiving Party shall return all Confidential Information to the Disclosing Party.

findings.rationale: The choice of governing law may not be favorable for one party, which could affect dispute resolution.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the State of California.
